type.name: T:Elysium.Extensions.LogicalTreeHelperExtensions
type.summary: Provides extension methods for search through logical tree of WPF elements.

method.name: M:Elysium.Extensions.LogicalTreeHelperExtensions.FindParent``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Searches a parent of the specified object in the logical tree of WPF elements.
method.param: An element, whose parent will be searched.
method.returns: The parent or null, if there are no object of specified type.

method.name: M:Elysium.Extensions.LogicalTreeHelperExtensions.FindTopLevelParent(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
method.summary: Searches a root element in the logical tree of WPF elements for the specified element.
method.param: An element, whose root element will be searched.
method.returns: Root element or null, if specified object is a root element.
